alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MOBILE...CENTRAL BALDWIN AND NORTHWESTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Spanish Fort, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Daphne, Fairhope, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Loxley, Stapleton, Molino, Summerdale, and Silverhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
